Shawn, can you tell us who we see from right to left in this photograph, please. 3 A. On the right is Carolyn. 4 5 THE COURT: Sorry. I need you at the microphone, please. 6 7 A. On the right is Carolyn, then Melissa, then Candace, and then a cousin. 8 9 Q. And how do you remember this picture? 10 A. I was there. 11 Q. Where were you? 12 A. On the boat right over there to the side. 13 Q. And what day was this? 14 A. Melissa's 16th birthday. 15 MS. COMEY: We can set that aside. Thank you. 16 Q. Did you go to Jeffrey Epstein's house with Melissa one time or multiple times? 17 18 A. Multiple. 19 Q. About how many times did you go with her when she was with Carolyn? 20 21 A. Her and Carolyn went one time together. 22 Q. For the rest of the time, who did Melissa go inside with? 23 A. It was her or Amanda. She took Amanda there. 24 MR. PAGLIUCA: Your Honor, objection. 25 THE COURT: Sustained. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00013333

text_blocks.content: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 55 of 262 1760 LC8VMAX2 Shawn - direct

BY MS. COMEY: Q. Shawn, can you tell us who we see from right to left in this photograph, please. A. On the right is Carolyn. THE COURT: Sorry. I need you at the microphone, please. A. On the right is Carolyn, then Melissa, then Candace, and then a cousin. Q. And how do you remember this picture? A. I was there. Q. Where were you? A. On the boat right over there to the side. Q. And what day was this? A. Melissa's 16th birthday. MS. COMEY: We can set that aside. Thank you. Q. Did you go to Jeffrey Epstein's house with Melissa one time or multiple times? A. Multiple. Q. About how many times did you go with her when she was with Carolyn? A. Her and Carolyn went one time together. Q. For the rest of the time, who did Melissa go inside with? A. It was her or Amanda. She took Amanda there. MR. PAGLIUCA: Your Honor, objection. THE COURT: Sustained.
